QuestData.Title: The Defense of Grom'gol: Murloc Menace
QuestData.Description: The Murkgill murlocs have been pushed out of the ocean by the Saltscale murlocs, so they make their refuge in the Kal'ai ruins to our northeast. This was acceptable in the past, but no longer.$b$bSeparated from the sea, the Murkgill have grown restless, and they send their foragers to attack my supply caravans. Send them a message: this behavior will NOT be tolerated by Hellscream's Horde.
QuestData.CompletionText: Beware the murloc fighter, $n. In my experience his size usually belies his strength.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. Hopefully the raids will stop for now.$b$bI have one more task for you, $n.
